Scheduled.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName == "Unfamiliar sign-in properties"
| extend Client_Location_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Client Location"]),Client_IP_Address_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Client IP Address"]),User_Account_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["User Account"]),Request_Id_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Request Id"])
| where Client_Location_ !contains "US"
